enumeration.enumitem: Changed the source tree structure. Normal non-digits will now be treated with their ASCII values. Digits will be treated with ASCII values too if mode ascii has been activated.
Added list.h and stack.h. Calculator can now be used with parameters: ./calculator '1+6+4\'. Added the v(erbose) command. Added the pr(ecision) int command. The - (minus) bug has been fixed!
